sentence: Steve Gaynor and Karrin Taylor Robson are sitting on millions for their gubernatorial campaigns as they prepare to hit the airwaves, while Katie Hobbs and Kari Lake offset strong fundraising numbers with big spending.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: As first campaign finance reports are filed, Arizona governor’s race comes into focus

sentence: Earlier on Monday, one of his rival candidates, former Arizona National Guard leader Mick McGuire, called on Brnovich to release records from the State Bar’s investigation of the complaints filed by Secretary of State Katie Hobbs and the Arizona Board of Regents.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: AG Mark Brnovich wants to send troops to the border (and himself to the Senate)

sentence: Karrin Taylor Robson and Aaron Lieberman offer vague references to water on their websites, while Matt Salmon, Katie Hobbs and Marco Lopez don’t mention it.
author: Joanna Allhands
title: What should Arizona governor and legislative candidates be saying about water?

sentence: They also aroused suspicion by making out-of-place comments critical of Lake and supportive of Democratic gubernatorial frontrunner Katie Hobbs.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Leftist Arizona State student groups allege infiltration by Kari Lake campaign staffers

sentence: Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, the Democratic frontrunner, called on the Senate to raise the limit and save K-12 schools from "this manufactured funding crisis."
author: Jeremy Duda
title: No Republican candidates for Arizona governor are calling for school cuts to be stopped

sentence: Republican Kari Lake, a former news anchor, is the only candidate who can defeat Democrat Katie Hobbs in Arizona’s gubernatorial race this November, a new poll found.
author: Alex Caldwell
title: Kari Lake is the only Republican AHEAD of Dem. Katie Hobbs in Arizona governor’s race, new poll finds

sentence: Karrin Taylor Robson, the other major GOP candidate for governor, and Democrat Katie Hobbs have thus far been silent, which might have been a good strategy for Lake.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: No, Kari Lake, what is going on at the border isn't remotely like what is going on in Ukraine

sentence: With her commanding position in recent primary surveys and her strong performance against Democrat Katie Hobbs, Kari Lake is the Republican frontrunner in the Arizona Gubernatorial race.” This poll of 1,000 likely general election voters was conducted through a live survey that collected 50.7% of the results from landlines and 49.3% from cell phones.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: POLL: Trump-Endorsed Arizona Gubernatorial Candidate Is The ONLY Republican Who Can Beat Radical Leftist Soros Funded Katie Hobbs

sentence: TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO) The Gateway Pundit recently reported on a new poll showing Trump-endorsed Kari Lake is the only candidate who can win the general election against Soros-funded socialist frontrunner Katie Hobbs.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: EXCLUSIVE: Trump-Endorsed Arizona Gubernatorial Candidate Kari Lake: “I’m The ONLY Candidate Who’s Vowing To And Will Get To The Bottom Of What Happened In 2020.” (VIDEO)

sentence: A recent survey showed that Lake, a former news anchor, is the only Republican candidate expected to be able to defeat Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, D-Ariz., in this crucial gubernatorial race.
author: Timothy Frudd
title: Kari Lake easily qualifies for the August primary

sentence: Lake is one of many Republicans running in Arizona’s Aug. 2 Republican primary, while the best known Democrat running is Secretary of State Katie Hobbs.
author: Amy Sherman
title: Jan. 6 defendants “are being held in prison without being charged.”

sentence: In a poll released on Thursday, Lake was reported as “out-polling” every Republican and Democrat gubernatorial candidate in the Grand Canyon State, leaving Democrat opponent Katie Hobbs in the dust.
author: Summer Lane
title: Trump holds fundraiser for Kari Lake at Mar-a-Lago

sentence: She is the only Republican in the race more popular than Democratic candidate Katie Hobbs — Arizona's current secretary of state.
author: Matthew Loh
title: Trump-endorsed Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake says she would fine airlines $1,000 for making passengers wear masks

sentence: In his 12-page April 6 “interim” report to Fann, Brnovich stated that his office found “serious vulnerabilities that must be addressed and raises questions about the 2020 election in Arizona.” Those conclusions appear to contradict mainstream news reports claiming Brnovich uncovered “no evidence of mass fraud in Maricopa County 2020 election results.” Although Brnovich reported that chain-of-custody procedures were violated, including by Secretary of State Katie Hobbs (D), Arizona Republic reported, “Attorney general’s report on election in Maricopa County questions procedures, doesn’t allege wrongdoing.” “Our review uncovered multiple violations of ballot transportation procedures,” Brnovich wrote on page 7.
title: Trump Hints against Endorsement of Brnovich

sentence: The defendants are Lake’s Democrat opponent in the gubernatorial race Katie Hobbs, the Maricopa County Board of Supervisors, and the Pima County Board of Supervisors.
author: Summer Lane
title: Kari Lake files injunction to STOP voting machines in Arizona
